title: Russ Cox Steps Down as Tech Lead of Go Programming Language
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: No great changes are expected as Russ Cox turns over the leadership baton to Austin Clements.
cntitle: Russ Cox 辞去 Go 编程语言技术主管职位
cndescription: 预计不会有重大变化，因为 Russ Cox 将领导权移交给 Austin Clements。
